title: Guys... GUYS. Neeko has no knock ups
body: She has a root and a stun. Not a single knock up in her kit. _Riot listened._

replies.body: They didn't listen its just that lesbians can't knock anyone up.

> [{quoted}](name=Karn Bishop,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=HXdJrkjE,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2018-11-21T05:43:46.979+0000)
>
> They didn't listen its just that lesbians can't knock anyone up.

Oh come on...
as a gay guy, I find this joke to be hilarious!
https://i.imgflip.com/677dc.jpg

No knock ups.
No dashes. 
No multi-casts. 
No resets. 

Are you sure Riot made this champion?
Yeah this is how they design mages.

{{champion:163}} 
{{champion:268}}

{{champion:142}} {{champion:245}} {{champion:105}} {{champion:7}} {{champion:117}} {{champion:61}} {{champion:134}} {{champion:115}} {{champion:143}}
Ekko, Fizz, LB are not mages

> [{quoted}](name=LeftyRaydy,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=HXdJrkjE,comment-id=0000000000020000,timestamp=2018-11-21T16:24:38.460+0000)
>
> Ekko, Fizz, LB are not mages

Two are burst mages (as dictated by riot's little classifications they used to have on champ profiles) and ekko goes in and out from being a bruiser mage to a tank and everything in between. His Q works just the same as Ahri's when it comes to clearing waves.
She has invisibility... So yes.

yeah she's just got, oh, 4.25 seconds of snare+stun 

that's reasonable, right?

> [{quoted}](name=Moody P,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=HXdJrkjE,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2018-11-21T04:01:17.460+0000)

She has to hit a perfect E that goes through 3 enemy champ in a skewer and also use her ulti to achieve that total amount of of CC.

> [{quoted}](name=Moody P,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=HXdJrkjE,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2018-11-21T04:01:17.460+0000)
>

So youre gonna tell me Morgana doesnt have as much cc?

> [{quoted}](name=TrikzterzArma,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=HXdJrkjE,comment-id=00010002,timestamp=2018-11-21T10:08:43.898+0000)
>
> So youre gonna tell me Morgana doesnt have as much cc?

as a morg main u can HARD CC 1 person for 4.5 seconds assuming they have no tenacity

starting with your ultimate if u channel it the entire 3 seconds (in which they are slowed) you will get a 1.5 second stun on every target still in teather. and its prety easy to time your Q landing on a stunned target.. which guarentees 3 more seconds of them not moving.. ( even if while rooted they can still attack back)

 so thats an _easy_ 4.5 seconds of them under hard CC

 not to mention u can take things like {{item:3143}}  or {{item:3905}}  to make it very hard to leave the area even if u need to {{item:3157}}  to live long enough within all those players

3 + 1.5 = 4.5.

Not saying it's not a lot, but it's definitely not a whole 5.5. Her kit is also very simple and based around that kind of single-target control.

And she's planned to have some type of update on top of that, I hear some of which gameplay-related.
Minor gameplay updated, mainly looking to change Passive, I think Pool?, and her Black Shield *if* they can find a meaningful idea to go with.

{{sticker:sg-soraka}}  yeah i somehow mentally got the 2.5 seconds of {{item:3157}}  stuck into my head XD my bad

> [{quoted}](name=Moody P,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=HXdJrkjE,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2018-11-21T04:01:17.460+0000)

> 
> that's reasonable, right?

1 of which you can't see the charge time if she's stealthed {{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

Which you won't be able to combo that way because if you used your snare first you would break out of your stealth. You need to ult and then hit the snare which won't be easy. It is def a long time though so I am just waiting until I see it in real games before I judge.

> [{quoted}](name=Prozzak,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=HXdJrkjE,comment-id=000100030000,timestamp=2018-11-21T13:02:57.142+0000)
>
> Which you won't be able to combo that way because if you used your snare first you would break out of your stealth. You need to ult and then hit the snare which won't be easy. It is def a long time though so I am just waiting until I see it in real games before I judge.

I've seen pro highlights with her already (from pbe) and they got it off just fine.

Pbe skill level is basically bronze, but regardless I guess if they can get off the combo I am wrong. I would have assumed once the stealth is broken the ult would automatically show the first part. There must be a slight delay or these people on pbe are casting the ult just before they cast the snare.

> [{quoted}](name=Prozzak,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=HXdJrkjE,comment-id=00010003000000000000,timestamp=2018-11-21T14:42:59.805+0000)
>
> Pbe skill level is basically bronze, but regardless I guess if they can get off the combo I am wrong. I would have assumed once the stealth is broken the ult would automatically show the first part. There must be a slight delay or these people on pbe are casting the ult just before they cast the snare.

It blatantly said in the tool tip that it would hide it if you used your other ability first.
However, using your root OR taking damage breaks the disguise.

> [{quoted}](name=Moody P,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=HXdJrkjE,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2018-11-21T04:01:17.460+0000)

Atleast tenacity works

Good bruisers take tenacity in their build or runes anyway so I am kinda sure it won't be as much as a factor.

I am more concerned by her W or R dmg/AP ratio...

Finally, a post about Neeko that isn't all:
Hah, GEIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIII!

> [{quoted}](name=Stand Alone Wolf,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=HXdJrkjE,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2018-11-21T06:47:43.919+0000)

HAH, GEEIIIIIIIIIIi!
Lies! I won't believe it until she still has no knockups after her traditional post-launch overbuffs.
Post Launch buff: Q bounces now forces enemy champions in the zone to bounce as well.

DW she has a three hit passive!

Or I guess... it qualifies as one?
You know what this means, next champ is going to be ALL knock-ups.
Hope he can afford all that child support.
Can't wait to see Shaco,Neeko in the same game. 4 clones

{{champion:35}} {{champion:62}} {{champion:7}} + Neeko

Begun, the clone wars have...
And round it all off with Kai'sa adc

> [{quoted}](name=inFamous Zion,realm=EUNE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=HXdJrkjE,comment-id=0008,timestamp=2018-11-21T10:51:11.562+0000)
>
> Can't wait to see Shaco,Neeko in the same game. 4 clones

neeko {{champion:35}} {{champion:82}} {{champion:268}} {{champion:74}} 

the army
Yeah let's *conveniently* forget the Nunu ult that she can charge while moving and in stealth.
What's your point, exactly? There is no knock-up there. And it's not really "stealth", she's still visible.

> [{quoted}](name=Wolfeur,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=HXdJrkjE,comment-id=00060000,timestamp=2018-11-21T11:12:20.748+0000)
>
> What's your point, exactly? There is no knock-up there. And it's not really "stealth", she's still visible.

Not a knock up, but a 1.25 second stun with a up to ~~4.5~~ 3 second root duration right after.

And yes, it's not stealth, I know.

It's a 3 second root, for one champion if you hit at least 2 others before…

And people weren't complaining about CC, they were complaining about knock-ups specifically, which is *very* different.

> [{quoted}](name=Wolfeur,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=HXdJrkjE,comment-id=0006000000000000,timestamp=2018-11-21T11:23:31.177+0000)
>
> It's a 3 second root, for one champion if you hit at least 2 others before…
> 
> And people weren't complaining about CC, they were complaining about knock-ups specifically, which is *very* different.

The only difference between normal CC and Knock-ups is the fact that one is affected by Tenacity and the other isn't.

And people very rarely build/optimize for Tenacity.
Fun fact, most knockups with lengthy durations are affected by tenacity, as they contain stuns after the duration of the knockup. Tenacity affects ali Q and naut r, for example.

> [{quoted}](name=Pika Fox,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=HXdJrkjE,comment-id=000600000000000000000001,timestamp=2018-11-21T15:14:50.550+0000)
>
> Fun fact, most knockups with lengthy durations are affected by tenacity, as they contain stuns after the duration of the knockup. Tenacity affects ali Q and naut r, for example.

Only Nautilus' R stuns after the knock up.

Alistar's Q doesn't.

First, all knockups/knockbacks contain stuns (which can be cleansed), second, yes ali's q has a stun duration longer than the knockup itself (which is why you cant move for a moment after you land).

All knockups/knockbacks can be negated via cleanse+movement ability (flash, ez e etc). Most heavy ones can be reduced fairly significantly by tenacity as well.

> [{quoted}](name=Pika Fox,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=HXdJrkjE,comment-id=00060000000000000000000100000000,timestamp=2018-11-21T16:48:29.640+0000)
>
> First, all knockups/knockbacks contain stuns (which can be cleansed), second, yes ali's q has a stun duration longer than the knockup itself (which is why you cant move for a moment after you land).
> 
> All knockups/knockbacks can be negated via cleanse+movement ability (flash, ez e etc). Most heavy ones can be reduced fairly significantly by tenacity as well.

Are you sure you're not mixing knockups with suspensions?

Positive. You can test it on ezreal if you want, or gp with flash (orange + flash knockups).

All displacements apply stun to prevent user action. Cleansing the stun allows you to ise abilities during said displacement, but cannot move. Using a movement ability allows you to override this and regain movement.

Tenacity lowers the duration of the stun attached to the displacement, meaning you can take action sooner (most stuns last longer than the displacements themselves).

> [{quoted}](name=Pika Fox,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=HXdJrkjE,comment-id=0006000000000000000000010000000000000000,timestamp=2018-11-21T18:08:19.046+0000)
>
> Positive. You can test it on ezreal if you want, or gp with flash (orange + flash knockups).

I'm not talking about Flashing the CC, I know you can do that.

I'm talking about the knockups being affected by Tenacity all of a sudden.

That was the most defining thing about knockups and why they are such a pain - because Tenacity doesn't affect them.
Read my edit.

> [{quoted}](name=Pika Fox,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=HXdJrkjE,comment-id=000600000000000000000001000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2018-11-21T18:11:36.089+0000)
>
> Read my edit.

I'm still sketchy.

If this was truly the case, knockups wouldn't be so widely despised.

Plus, I cannot find the information you are currently saying on the wikia.

> The only difference between normal CC and Knock-ups is the fact that one is affected by Tenacity and the other isn't.

Tenacity AND cleansing abilities. Cleanse, QSS, Mikeal's, GP's orange, Olaf's Ragnarok, Alistar's ult, Rengar's Roar.

> And people very rarely build/optimize for Tenacity.

Yeah…because the game is filled with knock-ups, rendering it useless…
